introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Axis Bank brings you the best deals in the market and a range of attractive features on loans for tractors. As part of its Agriculture Loans portfolio, Axis Bank offers Tractor Loans to both first-time and experienced applicants, with loan amounts and tenures that suit your requirements. For farmers who already own tractors and need to fulfill their farming needs with even more confidence, Axis Bank offers Loan Against Tractor. You need to fulfill the Tractor Loans eligibility criteria. One of the main criteria to avail the Tractor Loan is a minimum 3 years of land holding for farmers.

banner.text: ट्रैक्टर के लिए लोन चाहिए? या अपने पुराने ट्रैक्टर की जानकारी के लिए नीचे क्लिक करें।

eligibility.title: Eligibility for Tractor Finances
items: Minimum age of applicant should be 18 years
Maximum age of applicant should be 75 years as on date of funding
Minimum 3 years of land holding for farmers

eligibility.title: Features and Benefits of Tractor Finances
items: Customized Loans
Flexible Repayment Options
Monthly/Quarterly/ Half-yearly/Annual Repayment Options
Loan for new as well as used tractors
Loan Against Existing Loan (Refinancing)
Hassle-free
Easy and Quick Documentation

interest_rates.title: Interest Rate and Charges for Tractor Finance

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Bank of Baroda offers loans for new tractors, tractor-drawn implements, power tillers and other farm machinery to support agricultural development.

banner.text: ट्रैक्टर के लिए लोन चाहिए? यहाँ क्लिक करें और अभी आवेदन करें।

eligibility.title: Features & Benefits
items: Loan up to cost of tractor including implements minus margin
Term Loan
Repayment period up to 9 years
Flexible repayment options

eligibility.title: Margin
items: Minimum 25% of the cost of the vehicle and implements

eligibility.title: Eligibility
items: Literate or illiterate farmers owning land or holding it on lease
Must use tractor at least 50% on own landholding
Minimum 4 acres of perennially irrigated land
≤6 acres landholding allowed for tractors up to 35 HP
Must grow high-value crops like sugarcane, grapes, bananas, vegetables

eligibility.title: Repayment Period
items: Tractors: up to 9 years
Power Tillers: up to 7 years
Based on repaying capacity, surplus generation & landholding

eligibility.title: Security
items: Hypothecation of tractor and implements
Charge/mortgage of land or third-party guarantee

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Bank of Baroda provides refinance for purchase of second-hand tractors to support small and marginal farmers.

banner.text: पुराना ट्रैक्टर खरीदने के लिए लोन चाहिए? यहाँ क्लिक करें।

eligibility.title: Features & Benefits
items: Loan up to ₹2 Lakhs
Term Loan
Repayment period: 3 to 5 years
Flexible repayment options

eligibility.title: Margin
items: 20% of the value assessed by approved surveyor or government valuer

eligibility.title: Eligibility
items: Farmers owning or holding land on lease (long term)
Minimum 2 acres of perennially irrigated land in own or joint name
Farmers from dairy, poultry, or fisheries also eligible

eligibility.title: Repayment Period
items: 3 to 5 years depending on tractor’s standard performance

eligibility.title: Security
items: Hypothecation of tractor and implements
Charge/mortgage of land or third-party guarantee
